{
  "marks_awarded": 6,
  "feedback": "Strengths: Correct identification of tropical storm with the greatest number of deaths after 2000; clear explanation of global atmospheric circulation model.
Gaps: Missing information on the link between air pressure and surface winds; incomplete explanation of climate change; unclear definition of 'fast speed of climate change'.
Improvements: Provide more specific examples of alternative energy production and planting trees; clarify the concept of 'toxic gases'; explain the role of alternative energy in reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
Alert": false
